info.title: MatrosDMS API
info.description:
# Document Management System API

Server-Sent Events (SSE) are available at `/api/stream/updates`.

post.summary: Create a new Category under parent {id}

get.summary: Get saved searches for current user

post.summary: Save a search (Name + MQL). Overwrites if name exists.
Append a new Item (User is auto-detected from Token)

post.description: Generates summaries, tables, or extraction based on the instruction.

parameters.name: instruction
parameters.description: What to do with the document

post.summary: Batch Move items to a new context (Folder)
Import category tree into a System Root (Restricted to WHO, WHAT, WHERE, KIND)
Get new Access Token using Refresh Token
Login user and return JWT + Refresh Token + User Object
Change current user's password and revoke all sessions

post.description: Sends a question to the LLM, augmented with context from the most relevant documents in the archive.

get.summary: Get tasks with filters and pagination
Get the raw template YAML content
Get the next free number for physical filing
Get document counts by month (last 12 months)

get.description: Returns a list of names matching the query for a specific dimension (who, where, folder, etc.)
Returns the text layer stripped of XML tags

get.summary: Get a system root category by type (WHO, WHAT, WHERE, KIND)
Get metadata for all Root Categories (Scope, Label)
Get tasks linked to a specific document

delete.summary: Delete a saved search by name

message.description: Dynamic payload depending on event type

PipelineStatusMessage.description: Final Result Payload from the Pipeline

uuid.description: The Database ShortUUID (null if not yet persisted)

sha256.description: The SHA-256 Hash of the file
SHA-256 Content Hash (used as ID in Staging)

ProgressMessage.description: Lightweight status update for running jobs

version.description: Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.
Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.
Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.
Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.
Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.
Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.
Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.
Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.

archived.description: True if the item is archived

version.description: Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.

dueDate.description: When the action must be completed

version.description: Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.

MSearchResult.description: A single row in the Search Result Table

EAiInstruction.description: The type of analysis or transformation to perform

EAiOutputFormat.description: The desired output format for the AI response

version.description: Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.

yaml.description: Category tree structure in YAML format

simulate.description: If true, checks for errors without creating categories

replace.description: If true, deletes existing children before import. If false, fails if Root is not empty.

version.description: Optimistic Locking Version. Send this back on updates.

conversationId.description: Optional ID to continue a conversation (Future feature)

dueDate.description: When the action must be completed

TemplateProposal.description: A specific template available for application

EJobStatus.description: Execution status of a background job

JobMessage.description: Details of a background scheduled task

uuid.description: Unique identifier for this specific execution

executionTime.description: When the job is scheduled to run (or started running)

ECategoryScope.description: Defines the scope/target of a Root Category
